channel.title: TBB connection interrupt & Error Dialog: "Bad IP"
channel.description: Using the Tor Browser _7.0a1-hardened_, page loading was interrupted with a small dialog box saying it couldn't connect- **"Bad IP"**. Is that unusual? Or some type of new feature to protect Tor connections?

item.title: TBB connection interrupt & Error Dialog: "Bad IP"
item.dc:creator: treycetra
item.description:
Using the Tor Browser 7.0a1-hardened, page loading was interrupted with a small dialog box saying it couldn’t connect- “Bad IP”. Is that unusual? Or some type of new feature to protect Tor connections?

Read full topic
item.source: TBB connection interrupt & Error Dialog: "Bad IP"
